blocks.content:
## **My Availability**

Right now, I'm contracting at The Co-op, working on their [Legal Services](https://www.co-oplegalservices.co.uk/ "Co-op Legal Services") website. They've extended my contract until **May 2021** so I won't be looking for a new role until April at the earliest.

hero.headline: Hi, my name is John
hero.textline: I'm a senior front-end developer based in Manchester.
